          <title>
            <string language="hu">Johannes Vermeer: Alvó lány. 1657. New York, Metropolitan Museum of Art. 87,6 x 76,5 cm. Olaj, vászon.</string>
            <string language="en">Johannes Vermeer: Sleeping girl. 1657. New York, Metropolitan Museum of Art. 87,6 x 76,5 cm. Oil, canvas.</string>

1657. New York, Metropolitanmuseum der kunst. 87.6 x
76.5 Zentimeter. Öl, Segeltuch.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Johannes Vermeer : Fille de sommeil.

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Johannes Vermeer: Menina dormindo.

            <string language="x-mt-it">Johannes Vermeer: Ragazza addormentata. 
1657. New York, museo metropolitano di arte. 87.6 x

            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ιοχαννες Vermeer: Κορίτσι ύπνου. 1657. Νέα Υόρκη, μητροπολιτικό μουσείο των εκατ. πετρελαίου 
αρθ. 87.6 X 76.5, καμβάς.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Johannes Vermeer: Muchacha durmiente. 
1657. Nueva York, museo metropolitana del arte. 87.6
x 76.5 centímetros. Aceite, lona.</string>

          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Asztalra támaszkodó, szendergő lény</string>
            <string language="en">A girl leaning and slumbering on a table </string>
